title: 2022 Influenza and Pneumococcal Vaccines and Administration Reimbursement
cleaned_text: Vaccines and Administration Reimbursement The following services are paid at 100 percent of the established fee schedule amount. Coinsurance and the annual deductible do not apply. - Payment allowances for influenza vaccines are effective August 1, 2021, unless stated otherwise - Influenza and pneumococcal vaccine payment allowances are subject to change on a quarterly basis* - Administration payment allowances are updated annually on January 1 *Quarterly changes to influenza and pneumococcal vaccine payment allowances can be located on the [CMS website](http://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Medicare-Fee-for-Service-Part-B-Drugs/McrPartBDrugAvgSalesPrice/index.html). Influenza, and Pneumococcal Administration Codes and Fees Following are the 2022 influenza and pneumococcal administration fees for dates of service January 1, 2022 through December 31, 2022. | | HCPCS Codes | | Description | | Ala. FSY 2022 Amount | | Tenn. FSY | | | | Admin influenza virus vac. | | $27.92 | | $27.70 | | $30.00 | | $27.72 | | G0009 | | Admin pneumococcal vaccine | | $27.92 | | $27.70 | | $30.00 | | $27.72 Influenza Virus Vaccine National Fees — Effective August 1, 2022 - July 31, 2023 The 2021/2022 flu season fees are listed below. Contractors are required to implement these fees no later than October 1, 2021. Palmetto GBA implemented the following fees on September 12, 2022, for dates of service August 1, 2022 and after. All claims processed and paid prior to September 12, 2022 will be automatically adjusted. No further action is required. |CPT® | Codes | | Description | | 08/01/22 - 7/31/23 Amount | | 90630* | | Flu vacc iiv4 no preserv id | | Pending | | 90653 | | Iiv adjuvant vaccine im | | Pending | | 90654* | | Flu vacc iiv3 no preserv id | | Pending | | 90655* | | Iiv3 vacc no prsv 0.25 ml im | | Pending | | 90656* | | Iiv3 vacc no prsv 0.5 ml im | | Pending | | 90657* | | Iiv3 vaccine splt 0.25 ml im | | Pending | | 90661* | | Cciiv3 vac no prsv 0.5 ml im | | Pending | | 90662 | | Iiv no prsv increased ag im | | $69.94 | | 90672 | | Laiv4 vaccine intranasal | | $26.88 | | 90673* | | Riv3 vaccine no preserv im | | Pending | | 90674 | | Cciiv4 vac no prsv 0.5 ml im | | $32.28 | | 90682 | | Riv4 vacc recombinant dna im | | $69.94 | | 90685* | | Iiv4 vacc no prsv 0.25 ml im | | Pending | | 90686 | | Iiv4 vacc no prsv 0.5 ml im | | $21.52 | | 90687 | | Iiv4 vaccine splt 0.25 ml im | | $10.24 | | 90688 | | Iiv4 vaccine splt 0.5 ml im | | $20.48 | | 90689* | | Vacc iiv4 no prsrv 0.25 ml im | | Pending | 90694 | | Quadrivalent(aIIV4) inactivated, adjuvanted, pres Cciiv4 vacc abx free im | | $30.58 | | Q2035* | | Afluria vacc, 3 yrs & >, im | | Pending | | Q2036* | | Flulaval vacc, 3 yrs & >, im | | Pending Please see IMPORTANT footnote below | | Q2037* | | Fluvirin vacc, 3 yrs & >, im | | Pending Please see IMPORTANT footnote below | | Q2038* | | Fluzone vacc, 3 yrs & >, im | | Pending Please see IMPORTANT footnote below | | Q2039 | | Influenza virus vaccine, nos | | Specify Drug Name; May Require Invoice * Important: Please verify coding where a fee is pending. This is usually an indication that there are no sources available to establish a fee. If billing a code with fee pending, you will need to provide a valid NDC for the current 2022/2023 flu season. Your claim will be rejected if incorrectly coded. The following HCPCS code to NDC crosswalk is made available for your reference. Note that some sources listed in this crosswalk represent 2017/2018, 2018/2019, 2019/2020. 2021/2022 and 2022/2023 flu season vaccines. These resources could be rejected if provided during the current 2022/2023 flu season. This information is also located on the [CMS website](https://www.cms.gov/medicare/medicare-part-b-drug-average-sales-price/2022-asp-drug-pricing-files).
